revised_title: Anniversary Meeting and Scientific Developments in 1875
tldr: The article discusses the 1875 Anniversary Meeting of the Royal Society of London, highlighting the notable members who passed away and the significant scientific advancements and expeditions during that year. It also mentions the Society's efforts to improve its publications, library management, and the Catalogue of Scientific Papers.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science and Technology
